short_summary: Procurement of six (6) Boat Trailer for Zodiac Hurricane MK5
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure six (6) Boat Trailer for Zodiac Hurricane MK5 for delivery to 2 x Ottawa, ON, 1 x Winnipeg, MB, 3 x Valcartier, QC. The requested delivery date is 120 days from contract award. Multiple contracts may be awarded. GSIN: 2320

[tender announcement]

**Request for Proposal: Zodiac Hurricane MK5 Boat Trailers**
------------------------------

**Title:** 
* English: Acquisition of Zodiac Hurricane MK5 Boat Trailers
* French: Acquisition de modèles de Zodiac Hurricane MK5

**Reference Number:** 
cb-8675-12927606

**Solicitation Number:** 
W8476-246774/A

**Publication Date:** 
2023-09-05

**Tender Closing Date:** **Expired**
2023-11-02T14:00:00

**Amendment Date:** 
2023-11-02

None

**Expected Contract End Date:** 
None

**Procurement Category:** 
Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** 
Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:**
* English: Competitive - Open Bidding
* French: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

**Selection Criteria:** 
Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** 
* English: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* French: Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

**Regions of Opportunity:** 
* English: World
* French: Monde

**Regions of Delivery:** 
* English: Canada
* French: Canada

**Contracting Entity Name:** 
Brian James

**Contracting Entity Address:** 
ADM(Mat)/DGLEPM/DLP5-3-4-1, Ottawa, ON K1A oK2, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Brian James
brian.james3@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-3299

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the procurement of six (6) Boat Trailers for Zodiac Hurricane MK5 for delivery to Ottawa, ON, Winnipeg, MB, and Valcartier, QC. The requested delivery date is 120 days from contract award. Multiple contracts may be awarded.

**Important Information:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bids must be submitted by email only to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca).
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
